name: Flameruby
description:
Can you hear that? The sizzle of a dwindling wick, an explosive eruption, and the crash of debris. Nothing beats the thrill of blowing something up! Grab up to 6 friends and blast into the exciting world of Flameruby! Use your unlimited storage of bombs to deconstruct the action-packed levels. Test your wits with dozens of item combinations or just have fun!Features
  • Lots of Bombs
  • Crates begging to be blown up
  • Rockets for flinging at foes
  • Force fields for temporary protection
  • Magnets for dragging enemies into explosions
  • Tools for constructing quick barriers
  • A mysterious letter

Want to change the way your character looks? Purchase Rubies in the DLC bundles to unlock dozens of skins, items, and backgrounds. They may be pricey, but they sure are stylish!
